Kubescope

Kubernetes learning support tool

View the Project on GitHub hizeph/kubescope

Kubescope Exercises

  • Create Pod
  • Create Deployment
  • Create Deployment with environment variables
  • Create Deployment with secret a environment variables
  • Create Sidecar, write to txt
  • Create InitContainer, write to txt
  • Create Postgres Deployment (before volumes are introduced), add connection in Kubescope
    • Add data
    • Restart deployment
    • Check data
  • Create ConfigMap, mount as volume
    • Build txt file
    • Build yaml file
  • Add volume o Postgres Deployment

This project is maintained by hizeph
